HOMEPAGE.TITLE: Hello, I'm
HOMEPAGE.SUBTITLE: Passionate, Curious, and Creative Developer
HOMEPAGE.CONTENT: From creative exploration to human-centered design, solving problems with a cup of coffee at hand, this is my recipe for creating intuitive and high-performing applications. Discover my work and learn more about me.

JOURNEY.SUMMARY1: Before diving into the exciting field of web development, I have followed a diverse professional path that has allowed me to acquire a wide range of valuable skills.
JOURNEY.SUMMARY2: I started my career as an electrician, an experience that taught me to work effectively in a team to achieve common objectives and to solve technical problems.
JOURNEY.SUMMARY3: Then, I spent a decade in the restaurant industry as a manager. This period allowed me to gain solid experience in leadership, project management, communication, as well as excellent organization and time management skills.
JOURNEY.SUMMARY4: Finally, I worked for three years as an independent barber. This experience strengthened my listening skills and precision, while developing my ability to create tailor-made solutions to meet the specific needs of each client.
JOURNEY.SUMMARY5: Each of these stages has contributed to shaping me as a meticulous, adaptable, and solution-oriented professional. These values and skills, I apply them today in my work as a web developer.
